video.title: Signing Time
video.synopsis: Blending animation and live action, this multisensory series introduces kids to American Sign Language, a "hands-on" second language used by millions.

episodes.synopsis: You will learn signs to help you to introduce yourself, share your name and make new friends. / You will learn signs for numbers and letters.
episodes.title: Let's Make Friends / Read Books and Count Numbers

episodes.synopsis: You will learn signs that help you ask and answer the question, How are you? / You will learn signs and songs you can use at any birthday celebration.
episodes.title: How Are You? / Happy Birthday

episodes.synopsis: You will learn signs and songs for a birthday party. / You'll learn fun signs for different ways to move your body.
episodes.title: It's a Birthday Party / See Me Move

episodes.synopsis: You will learn more fun signs for different ways to move your body. / You will learn fun signs for seasons and weather that you can use all year long.
episodes.title: Let's Move and Groove / The Four Seasons

episodes.synopsis: You will learn signs for things you can do outside. / You will learn signs for things we see outside.
episodes.title: Playing Outside / What Do You See Outside?

episodes.synopsis: You will learn signs and songs for each day of the week. / You'll learn signs you can use to talk about time.
episodes.title: Days of the Week / It's Calendar Time

episodes.synopsis: You'll learn signs about sports you can watch or play. / You'll learn signs about your favorite games to play.
episodes.title: My Favorite Sports / Game Time

episodes.synopsis: You'll learn signs for the things in your kitchen and family room. / You'll learn signs for things in the bathroom and other rooms in your house.
episodes.title: Kitchen-Family Room / My House

episodes.synopsis: You'll learn signs for things in your bedroom and for things you can do to keep your room clean. / You'll learn signs for clothes.
episodes.title: My Things / My Clothes

episodes.synopsis: You'll learn signs for tasks around the house to keep it clean. / You'll learn signs for things you can do to help around the house.
episodes.title: Around the House / Helping Around the House

episodes.synopsis: You'll learn signs for numbers, letters and different ways to move your body. / You'll learn signs you can use to talk about books and stories.
episodes.title: What Time Is It: Part 1 / Once Upon a Time

episodes.synopsis: You'll learn signs you can use to talk about choosing books and reading them together. / You'll learn signs for your favorite colors.
episodes.title: Read a Book With Me / Colors

episodes.synopsis: You'll learn signs for all the colors in a box of crayons. / You'll learn signs you can use when you need to find something that's been lost.
episodes.title: Box of Crayons / Who Has the Frog

episodes.synopsis: You'll learn signs for asking and answering questions. / You'll learn signs for letters and different ways to move your body and hear a bedtime story.
episodes.title: Let's Learn About Questions / What Time Is It: Part 2
